SamPy.astronomy.datamanipulation.percentile_bins¶

SamPy.astronomy.datamanipulation.percentile_bins(xdata, ydata, xmin, xmax, nxbins=15, log=False, limit=6)¶

Computes median and 16 and 84 percentiles of y-data in bins in x.

Parameters:
  • xdata – numpy array of xdata
  • ydata – numpy arrya of ydata
  • xmax – maximumx value of x that data are binned to
  • xmin – minimum value of x that data are binned to
  • nxbins – number of bins in x
  • log – if True, xbins are logarithmically spaced, else linearly
  • limit – the minimum number of values in a bin for which the median and percentiles are returned for.
Returns:

mid points of the bins, median, 16 per cent percentile, and 84 per cent percentile.
